name: Meteoroids (Kablamo)
description: Shoot at the meteoroids and UFOs to destroy them, but don't crash into them; your deflector shield can only take so much abuse. Three meteoroids will leave you vulnerable, but one UFO collision will take you out! Destroy all the meteoroids and you win! Use the up arrow key to accelerate and the left and right arrow keys to turn. Press the space bar to fire and the ctrl key to warp out of danger.
